00018 #include <math.h>
00019 #include <votca/tools/histogramnew.h>
00020 #include <votca/tools/tokenizer.h>
00021 #include <votca/csg/csgapplication.h>
00022 
00023 using namespace std;
00024 using namespace votca::csg;
00025 using namespace votca::tools;
00026 
00027 
00028 class CsgDensityApp
00029     : public CsgApplication
00030 {
00031     string ProgramName() { return "csg_density"; }
00032     void HelpText(ostream &out) { 
00033         out << "Calculates the mass density distribution along a box axis or radial density profile from reference point";
00034     }
00035 
00036     // some program options are added here
00037     void Initialize();
00038     
00039     // we want to process a trajectory
00040     bool DoTrajectory() {return true;}
00041     bool DoMapping() {return true;}
00042     bool DoMappingDefault(void) { return false; }
00043    
00044     // write out results in EndEvaluate
00045     void EndEvaluate();
00046     void BeginEvaluate(Topology *top, Topology *top_atom);
00047     void EvalConfiguration(Topology *top, Topology *top_ref);
00048 
00049     bool EvaluateOptions() {
00050         CsgApplication::EvaluateOptions();
00051         CheckRequired("out", "no output topology specified");
00052         CheckRequired("trj", "no trajectory file specified");
00053         return true;
00054     };
00055 
00056 
00057 protected:
00058     string _filter, _out;
00059     HistogramNew _dist;
00060     double _rmax;
00061     int _nbin;
00062     double _scale;
00063     double _step;
00064     int _frames;
00065     int _nblock;
00066     int _block_length;
00067     vec _ref;
00068     vec _axis;
00069     string _axisname;
00070     string _molname;
00071     double _area;
00072     void WriteDensity(int nframes,const string &suffix="");
00073 };
00074 
00075 
00076 int main(int argc, char** argv)
00077 {
00078     CsgDensityApp app;
00079     return app.Exec(argc, argv);
00080 }
00081 
00082 void CsgDensityApp::BeginEvaluate(Topology *top, Topology *top_atom) {
00083 
00084      matrix box = top->getBox();
00085      vec a = box.getCol(0);
00086      vec b = box.getCol(1);
00087      vec c = box.getCol(2);
00088     
00089     _dist.setPeriodic(true);
00090     _axis=vec(0,0,0);
00091     _area=0;
00092     if(_axisname=="x") {
00093       _axis.setX(1);
00094       _rmax = abs(a);
00095       _area= abs(b^c);
00096     }
00097     else if(_axisname=="y") {
00098       _axis.setY(1);
00099        _rmax = abs(b);
00100       _area= abs(a^c);
00101     }
00102     else if(_axisname=="z") {
00103       _axis.setZ(1);
00104       _rmax = abs(c);
00105       _area= abs(a^b);
00106     }
00107     else if(_axisname=="r") {
00108       _dist.setPeriodic(false);
00109       _rmax = min(min(abs(a/2), abs(b/2)), abs(c/2));
00110     } else {
00111       throw std::runtime_error("unknown axis type");
00112     }
00113 
00114     if(OptionsMap().count("rmax"))
00115       _rmax = OptionsMap()["rmax"].as<double>();
00116     
00117     if(OptionsMap().count("block-length")){
00118        _block_length=OptionsMap()["block-length"].as<int>();
00119     } else {
00120       _block_length=0;
00121     }
00122 
00123 
00124     if (_axisname=="r") {
00125       if(!OptionsMap().count("ref"))
00126          _ref = a/2+b/2+c/2;
00127        cout << "Using referece point: " << _ref << endl;
00128     } 
00129     else if(OptionsMap().count("ref"))
00130         throw std::runtime_error("reference center can only be used in case of spherical density");
00131     
00132     _nbin=(int)floor(_rmax/_step);
00133     _dist.Initialize(0, _rmax, _nbin);
00134     
00135     cout << "rmax: " << _rmax << endl;
00136     cout << "axis: " << _axisname << endl;
00137     cout << "Bins: " << _nbin << endl;
00138     _frames=0;
00139     _nblock=0;
00140 }  
00141 
00142 void CsgDensityApp::EvalConfiguration(Topology *top, Topology *top_ref)
00143 {
00144     // loop over all molecules
00145     bool did_something = false;
00146     for(MoleculeContainer::iterator imol=top->Molecules().begin(); imol!=top->Molecules().end(); ++imol) {
00147         Molecule *mol = *imol;
00148         if(!wildcmp(_molname.c_str(),mol->getName().c_str())) 
00149             continue;
00150         int N = mol->BeadCount();
00151             for(int i=0; i<N; i++) {
00152                 Bead *b = mol->getBead(i);        
00153                 if(!wildcmp(_filter.c_str(), b->getName().c_str()))
00154                     continue;
00155                 double r;
00156                 if (_axisname=="r") {
00157                     r = abs(top->BCShortestConnection(_ref, b->getPos()));
00158                 } else {
00159                     r = b->getPos() *  _axis;
00160                 }
00161                 _dist.Process(r, b->getM());
00162                 did_something = true;
00163             }
00164     }
00165     _frames++;
00166     if (!did_something) throw std::runtime_error("No molecule in selection");
00167     if(_block_length != 0) {
00168         if((_nframes % _block_length)==0) {
00169             _nblock++;
00170             string suffix = string("_") + boost::lexical_cast<string>(_nblock);
00171             WriteDensity(_block_length,suffix);
00172             _dist.Clear();
00173         }
00174     }
00175 }
00176 
00177 
00178 // output everything when processing frames is done
00179 void CsgDensityApp::WriteDensity(int nframes, const string &suffix)
00180 {
00181   if (_axisname=="r") {
00182     _dist.data().y() = _scale/(nframes*_rmax/(double)_nbin *4*M_PI) * element_div( _dist.data().y(),
00183                    element_prod(_dist.data().x(), _dist.data().x()));
00184   } else {
00185     _dist.data().y() = _scale/((double)nframes * _area * _rmax/ (double)_nbin ) *_dist.data().y();
00186   }
00187   _dist.data().Save(_out + suffix);    
00188 }
00189 
00190 void CsgDensityApp::EndEvaluate()
00191 {
00192   if(_block_length == 0) 
00193     WriteDensity(_frames);
00194 }
00195 
00196 // add our user program options
00197 void CsgDensityApp::Initialize()
00198 {
00199     CsgApplication::Initialize();
00200     // add program option to pick molecule
00201     AddProgramOptions("Specific options:")
00202              ("axis", boost::program_options::value<string>(&_axisname)->default_value("r"), "[x|y|z|r] density axis (r=spherical)")
00203              ("step", boost::program_options::value<double>(&_step)->default_value(0.01), "spacing of density")
00204              ("block-length", boost::program_options::value<int>(), "  write blocks of this length, the averages are cleared after every write")
00205              ("out", boost::program_options::value<string>(&_out), "Output file")
00206              ("rmax", boost::program_options::value<double>(), "rmax (default for [r] =min of all box vectors/2, else l )")
00207              ("scale", boost::program_options::value<double>(&_scale)->default_value(1.0), "scale factor for the density")
00208              ("molname", boost::program_options::value<string>(&_molname)->default_value("*"), "molname")
00209              ("filter", boost::program_options::value<string>(&_filter)->default_value("*"), "filter bead names")
00210              ("ref", boost::program_options::value<vec>(&_ref), "reference zero point");
00211 }
